reuo.resources.io

Class DecodedChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.io.DecodedChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Channel, ReadableByteChannel

    public class DecodedChannel
extends Object
implements ReadableByteChannel
    Decodes Run Length Encoding (RLE) from the underlying channel. Due to legacy format each run entry is 4 bytes, with 2 bytes for the run-length and 2 bytes for the 16-bit pixel. Because runs would never approach 216 this effectively wastes 8-bits per entry.
    Author:
    Kristopher Ives, Lucas Green

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DecodedChannel(FileChannel in)
      Wraps the input channel as the underlying source for the encoded data.
